mapper.insert: insert into payinfo (payinfoid, ocode, uid, paymentType, paystatus, paynumber, create_time, update_time) values (#{payinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ocode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymenttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update payinfo set ocode = #{ocode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paymentType = #{paymenttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paynumber = #{paynumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where payinfoid = #{payinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select payinfoid, ocode, uid, paymentType, paystatus, paynumber, create_time, update_time from payinfo
